reference_summary:
UV LED Nail Lamp 120W High Power Nail Dryer for Gel Nail Polish with 4 Timer Setting 42 gel Light,Professional Auto Sensor Nail Light for Fingernail,Toenail,Home,Salon
LWQIONG
{'Brand': 'LWQIONG', 'Special Feature': 'Motion Sensor', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'Plastic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene', 'Room Type': 'Office'}
I used this to put on my first set of polygel nails.  It was super easy to use and did the job as I expected it would.  The auto function was extremely handy, as was the ability to time it if I wanted.
Did the job as expected
Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Nail Art Gel Kits for Home DIY Manicure, Blue Nude Series
AIFAIFA
{'Color': 'Blue', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.48 Pounds'}
I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit. I already had a UV lamp, but I like this one better.  It is more compact and seems to work a little better. I love the polish, and all of the nail art. It is so much easier than normal polish.  I am by no means an expert, but the poly gel is the only thing that did not work for me.  I could not get it to cure.  Even after the full polish it still felt like it could crumble off at any moment.  I only did by thumbs, pinkies, and ring fingers, and the gel was broken on all of them in a couple of days.  It seemed to last a little longer on the nails I did polish as well (my thumbs).  For one day they might be okay.  But the rest of the kit makes it worth it.
I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit
3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE
PURELEOR

I have just started to delve into the world of false lashes.  I am by no means an expert, and still am not sure which look I prefer.  This brand, with the eyeliner, is one that I find among the easier to apply.  I think I may have to trim them, and I sometimes have issues on the outside corner with keeping it in place, but they flatter my eyes well.
Eyelash beginner

FRENCH GIRL
{'Brand': 'FRENCH GIRL', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing,Hydrating', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.59 x 3.58 inches; 14.46 Ounces', 'UPC': '850000595255'}
I love this is vegan and cruelty free.  The lotion works very well, it is silky smooth and keeps my parts moisturized.  The cuticle oil in the roller works great as well.  My only issue is the smell.  Sometimes I can take it after it has aired out on my skin but mostly it is just too strong for me to tolerate.  It is not an unpleasant smell, just overpowering.  Someone who is sensitive to smells may not be able to use this.
Works well but has a very strong smell

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user continues to refine their beauty interests, now actively exploring hair styling tools, including clip-in hair extensions that offer both versatility and ease of use. They appreciate innovative yet simple solutions that enhance their beauty routine. Although open to trying new styles, they find complex techniques challenging without dedicated practice.

Prioritizing convenience, the user seeks products that streamline their regimen while reflecting a positive attitude toward performance, recognizing the balance between utility and potential improvement. Their recent interest in hair extensions reflects a desire for creative expression, particularly through color enhancements, while maintaining a commitment to practicality.

Versatility remains crucial, as they look for tools and products that can be easily adapted for personal styling and professional use. The user emphasizes material quality, opting for durable yet aesthetically pleasing items. Maintaining a holistic approach to beauty, they integrate effective hair care solutions alongside skin hydration and nail care.

They are committed to cruelty-free and vegan products, favoring subtle fragrances due to their sensitivity to strong scents. The user embraces experimentation, aiming to enhance their skills and enjoy their beauty journey. Overall, their selections illustrate a wish for efficiency, quality, and a rewarding self-care experience across multiple dimensions of beauty.
